meta.title: Event Seating & RSVP Management Platform
meta.subtitle: Production Full-Stack System for Live Events
meta.shortDescription: A production-ready full-stack platform used to manage seating, RSVPs, and WhatsApp communication for real live events.

content.title: Overview
body: A production-ready, full-stack web platform designed to manage event seating, guest lists, RSVP flows, and automated WhatsApp communication for weddings and large private events.
This system is actively used in production by an event-settings company, supporting real events with hundreds of guests, real operational constraints, and live on-site usage.

content.title: Real-World Usage
bullets: Deployed and running in a live production environment
Used by professional event staff during actual events
Handles real guest data, seating logistics, and time-critical messaging
Designed to remain stable under last-minute changes and on-site pressure
body: This is not a demo or prototype â€” it is a working system built for real customers.

content.title: What the Platform Solves
body: Event organizers typically struggle with tracking hundreds of guests and RSVP responses, managing table assignments without exceeding capacity, coordinating staff access without risking data corruption, and sending timely, reliable reminders and updates.
This platform replaces manual spreadsheets and messaging with a secure, centralized system built for real event operations.

sections.subtitle: Event & User Management
items: Manage multiple events with dates, locations, guarantees, and balances
Assign users to events with strict, event-scoped permissions
Role-based access including Admin with full system control, Customer with a customer-facing portal, and Event-specific users with limited access to a single event

sections.subtitle: Guest & Table Management
items: Create and manage guests and tables with enforced seat limits
Assign guests to tables with real-time over-capacity warnings
Track arrivals and attendance during the event
Import guest lists from Excel with Hebrew and English headers supported
Export Excel summaries and seating PDFs with Hebrew fonts embedded

sections.subtitle: RSVP System (Guest-Facing)
items: Unique, secure RSVP page per guest
Guests respond with Coming, Not Coming, or Not Sure
No login required for guests
Real-time RSVP statistics in the admin dashboard
RSVP links can be copied or sent directly via WhatsApp

sections.subtitle: WhatsApp Automation
items: RSVP invitations sent via WhatsApp
Automated reminders sent two hours before the event
Messages include event location and assigned table number
Filtering logic prevents duplicate or unnecessary messages
Admin test tools and manual triggers included

sections.subtitle: Customer Portal
items: Live event overview
Seating and guest visibility
Arrival tracking
Table occupancy alerts
Downloadable operational reports

content.title: Security & Reliability (Production-Focused)
body: Because this system runs in production, security and reliability were core requirements.
Role-based access control is enforced at middleware, API, and UI levels.
Event-scoped data isolation prevents cross-event access.
Field-level protections are applied for sensitive financial and staff data.
Rate limiting is enforced on authentication and write operations.
Comprehensive audit logging is implemented for all sensitive actions.
Prisma ORM is used with strict validation and parameterized queries.

sections.subtitle: Frontend
items: Next.js using the App Router
React
TypeScript
Tailwind CSS

sections.subtitle: Backend
items: API-driven architecture with protected routes

sections.subtitle: Database
items: PostgreSQL
Prisma ORM

sections.subtitle: Authentication
items: Encrypted session-based authentication

sections.subtitle: Messaging
items: WhatsApp integration using Twilio / Business API

sections.subtitle: Storage
items: Cloud storage for event assets and sketches

sections.subtitle: Internationalization
items: Full right-to-left UI support for Hebrew
